DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between RTX ( Biphasic Cuirass Ventilator ) Physiotherapy Cystic Fibrosis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Cystic fibrosis ( CF ) associate chronic progressive lung disease may lead respiratory failure.Bi-Phasic Cuirass Ventilation ( BPCV ) form non-invasive respiratory support , provide negative pressure ventilation well high frequency chest wall oscillation cough mode.The standard therapy CF patient release mucous treatment physiotherapist . In study compare effect BPCV regular physiotherapy full pulmonary function test prior post treatment .
DOC.criteria: CF patient 7 year old Hemoptysis Pregnancy
